text: I often visually inspect to see if text is overlapping. Is it possible to ask a plot if it has enough room?

elements.text: I often visually inspect to see if text is overlapping. Is it possible to ask a plot if it has enough room?

text: The whole overlapping-text problem is tricky to solve automatically, as sometimes even technically too wide text can look ok, while technically non-overlapping text can look bad. So there will always be some left over checks to do visually. I'm not sure if there's currently a way to check in an `annotations` object whether the single texts overlap, but I have a longstanding PR to improve text layout handling that would allow to query that. In that case you could check if all xticklabels are separated for example
